name: Sunny Shine Funland!
description:
While you are waiting for Sunny Shine Funland!, check out Tranquil Studios first visual novel, Oakwood Academy of Spells and Sorcery! Available here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/818940/Oakwood_Academy_of_Spells_and_Sorcery/

Sunny Shine Funland! follows Dustin, a young man who's moved to a new city and is desperate for a job to cover the rent! Luckily, he's hired as an employee at an amusement park where he soon encounters three lovely coworkers who blow him away! Can he seize love this summer while maintaining his crazy new job? Or will the unfamiliar tasks prove to be too much for him to handle? You decide – Special memories await! Have some fun under the sun!


Key Features:

- Visual novel game with sexy content

- Enjoy the game with high-quality artwork of characters, backgrounds, and CG scenes.

- Many choices to make that affect your route and dialogues

- Multiple different endings good and bad

- A playful well-written story-line.

- Multiple save slots and full visual novel functions.
